attributes.additional_details: Please if the government can help our teenagers and children from stop vaping a cigarette is bad for there health vapes and cigarettes should be bad no teens should be allowed to buy them thanks
attributes.background: We want the government to bad vapes and cigarettes because nowdays a lot of teenagers are addicted to them

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban the sale of nicotine products to anyone born on or after 1 January 2009
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/725581
